title: Mimosa 150cm (4'11") Multicolour Felt Ball Rugs - Genuine Nepalese Handmade Area Rugs - Custom Size Rugs are Also Available
features: 100% wool being imported from New Zealand and Tibet
Handmade in Nepal without using harmful chemicals and sourced from Fair Trade
Attractive design, Bright colour and Soft feeling. Can be used on both sides
Available in any shape and colour. Custom size rugs will be made to order
description: When it comes to finding the right decor for your home, many of the ones on the market can seem too stuffy and plain. You want something that’s colourful and exciting, and reflects just how fun you are. That’s why you should consider felt ball rugs for your home because they do just that. Handmade rug constructed from felt balls can be a unique way of spicing up a room, whether it’s your kitchen, bedroom, living room, office, nursery, kids room or near your entry way. So if you’re looking for a rug that can add some much-needed colour to your home, then you’ve come to the right place. Our felt ball rugs are like nothing else you’ll find on the market, as they’re each made with an attention to detail and with the care that’s needed to create mats that will last a long time. Custom design rugs or custom sizes rugs are our featured products. Please contact us if you have your own creative design in mind. This rug is made in Nepal by experienced skilled hand. The designer has done great job to create this beautiful piece of attraction. The rug is entirely handmade in traditional way. Each ball is hand felted from sheep wool and dyed with individually selected colors. After the combination of different color felt balls are ready, they are sewn together to create a gorgeous soft mat. Mostly the women from remote villages with poor family background has been involved in making this type of crafts. Therefore, purchasing of this product enhances their lifestyle with basic everyday living needs.
